description: Manage probes to gather and evaluate information on an application gateway.

commands.name: az network application-gateway probe create
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway probe create --gateway-name
                                            --name
                                            --resource-group
                                            [--from-http-settings {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--from-settings {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--host]
                                            [--interval]
                                            [--match-body]
                                            [--match-status-codes]
                                            [--min-servers]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--path]
                                            [--port]
                                            [--protocol {Http, Https, Tcp, Tls}]
                                            [--threshold]
                                            [--timeout]
examples: az network application-gateway probe create -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyProbe --protocol https --host 127.0.0.1 --path ProbePath

commands.name: az network application-gateway probe delete
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway probe delete --gateway-name
                                            --name
                                            --resource-group
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network application-gateway probe delete -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyProbe

commands.name: az network application-gateway probe list
examples: az network application-gateway probe list -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway

commands.name: az network application-gateway probe show
commands.summary: Get the details of a probe.
examples: az network application-gateway probe show -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyProbe

commands.name: az network application-gateway probe update
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway probe update --gateway-name
                                            --name
                                            --resource-group
                                            [--add]
                                            [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--from-http-settings {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--from-settings {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--host]
                                            [--interval]
                                            [--match-body]
                                            [--match-status-codes]
                                            [--min-servers]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--path]
                                            [--port]
                                            [--protocol {Http, Https, Tcp, Tls}]
                                            [--remove]
                                            [--set]
                                            [--threshold]
                                            [--timeout]
examples: az network application-gateway probe update -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyProbe --timeout 60

commands.name: az network application-gateway probe wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
